### This exists to turn a length and angle variable into a simple number that can be parsed by spawn_system
### Yes, this is a bad workaround for variables and script values not being supported. It is what it is.

# note: paradox switch statements cannot check variables, it has to be an if

## call from system scope
# this effect is generated by python script
giga_svalinn_select_length_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 0.25
			}
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 0.25
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 0.5 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 0.5
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 0.75 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 0.75
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 1 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 1
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 2 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 2
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 3 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 3
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 4 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 4
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 5 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 5
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 6 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 6
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 7 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 7
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 8 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 8
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 9 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 9
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 10 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 10
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 11 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 11
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 12 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 12
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 13 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 13
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 14 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 14
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 15 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 15
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 16 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 16
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 17 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 17
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 18 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 18
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 19 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 19
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 20 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 20
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 21 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 21
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 22 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 22
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 23 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 23
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 24 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 24
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 25 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 25
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 26 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 26
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$

		}

	else_if = {

			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 27 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 27
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$

	else_if = {

			length_selected = 28

	else_if = {

			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 29 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 29
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 30 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 30
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 31 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 31

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 33
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$

			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 34 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 34

				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 35 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 35

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 36

	else_if = {

			length_selected = 63

	else_if = {

			length_selected = 64

	else_if = {

				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 66 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 66
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 67 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 67
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 290 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 290
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 295 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 295
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 300 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 300
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 305 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 305
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 310 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 310

			length_selected = 540

	else_if = {

				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 545 }

			length_selected = 545
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$

		}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 550 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 550
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$

		}

	else_if = {
		limit = {

				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 555 }

				value <= 570 }

		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 570
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 575 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 575
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 580 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 580
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 585 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 585
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 590 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 590
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 595 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 595
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 600 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 600
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $length_variable$
				value <= 605 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 605
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else = {
		giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
			length_selected = 7700
			angle_variable = $angle_variable$
		}
	}
}


giga_svalinn_select_angle_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 0
			}
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 0
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 1 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 1
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 2 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 2
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 3 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 3
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 4 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 4
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 5 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 5
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 75 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 75
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 145 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 145
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 215 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 215
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}

	}

		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$

			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 354
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 355 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 355
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 356 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 356
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 357 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 357
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 358 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 358
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 359 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 359
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				which = $angle_variable$
				value <= 360 }
		}
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 360
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}

	else = {
		giga_svalinn_halfway_system_spawn_effect = {
			LENGTH = $length_selected$
			ANGLE = 360
			giga_system_x = $giga_system_x$
		}
	}
}
